channel.title: About the buffer category
channel.description:
Short posts (with descriptive long titles) tagged by topics / categories. Choose your favorite (or all) and hit the `watching` button to quickly get notified of everything cregox is up to! ;)
- Quick collection of what cregox is posting on twitter, facebook, gplus, linkedin, whatever social media. - Good if you're only interested in some topics, or you just want the `Too Long; Didn't Read;` version of things.
